001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.http;
002
003import java.util.Collection;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Locale;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Set;
008import java.util.regex.Pattern;
009
010/**
011 * Port-friendly session extractor mirroring the legacy implementation.
012 */
013public final class HttpSessionExtractor {
014  private final Set<String> cookieKeys;
015  private final List<Pattern> headerPatterns;
016
017  /**
018   * Creates a session extractor using the provided cookie keys and header patterns.
019   *
020   * @param cookieKeys cookie names inspected for session identifiers
021   * @param headerRegexes header regexes used to extract session identifiers
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  public HttpSessionExtractor(Collection<String> cookieKeys, Collection<String> headerRegexes) {
025    this.cookieKeys = cookieKeys.stream()
026        .map(k -> k.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT))
027        .collect(java.util.stream.Collectors.toSet());
028    this.headerPatterns = headerRegexes.stream()
029        .map(r -> Pattern.compile(r, Pattern.CASE_INSENSITIVE))
030        .toList();
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * Extracts a session identifier from HTTP request headers.
035   *
036   * @param headers normalized header map
037   * @return session identifier or {@code null} when not found
038   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
039   */
040  public String fromRequestHeaders(Map<String, String> headers) {
041    for (Map.Entry<String, String> e : headers.entrySet()) {
042      String line = e.getKey() + ": " + e.getValue();
043      for (Pattern p : headerPatterns) {
044        var m = p.matcher(line);
045        if (m.find()) {
046          return "HDR:" + m.group(m.groupCount());
047        }
048      }
049    }
050    String cookie = headers.getOrDefault("cookie", null);
051    if (cookie != null) {
052      for (String part : cookie.split(";")) {
053        int eq = part.indexOf('=');
054        if (eq > 0) {
055          String k = part.substring(0, eq).trim().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
056          if (cookieKeys.contains(k)) {
057            return "SID:" + part.substring(eq + 1).trim();
058          }
059        }
060      }
061    }
062    return null;
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Extracts a session identifier from {@code Set-Cookie} response headers.
067   *
068   * @param setCookies list of {@code Set-Cookie} header values
069   * @return session identifier or {@code null} when not found
070   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
071   */
072  public String fromSetCookie(List<String> setCookies) {
073    for (String sc : setCookies) {
074      int eq = sc.indexOf('=');
075      if (eq > 0) {
076        String k = sc.substring(0, eq).trim().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
077        if (cookieKeys.contains(k)) {
078          int semi = sc.indexOf(';', eq + 1);
079          String v = semi > 0 ? sc.substring(eq + 1, semi) : sc.substring(eq + 1);
080          return "SID:" + v.trim();
081        }
082      }
083    }
084    return null;
085  }
086}
087
088
089
